definition: to tailgate/to hit the car in front as a result of tailgating
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish
horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc

sentences.english: So is tailgating, but we'll skip that part.
sentences.chinese: 追尾也是，但是我们还是跳过这部分比较好。

sentences.english: A kind of system avoiding automobile rear-end collision is introduced in detail based on the image processing recognition.
sentences.chinese: 详细介绍了一种基于汽车防追尾的图像处理识别系统。

sentences.english: Had been out riding a motorcycle rear-end accident while drag racing.
sentences.chinese: 曾经骑摩托车飙车时出过追尾事故。

sentences.english: We have seen as much as a 50% reduction in our preventable rear-end collisions.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经看到，可预防的追尾事故下降了50%。

sentences.english: To top it off, I got a ticket for rear-ending the Jeep.
sentences.chinese: 最糟糕的是，我还收到了一张追尾的罚单。

sentences.english: The accident happened on the highway between Hefei and Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 追尾发生在连接合肥和南京的宁合高速上。

sentences.english: When she borrowed Lucy's car, it got rear-ended.
sentences.chinese: 当她借了露西的车，车被追尾。

sentences.english: They tailgate, which means to drive too closely behind the car in front of them.
sentences.chinese: 他们追尾，意味着离他们前面的车太近。

sentences.english: Julie was in a car accident. Another car rear-ended her.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉出车祸了，被另一辆车追尾了。

sentences.english: The aftereffect for rear-end collision between a car and a truck is serious in traffic accidents.
sentences.chinese: 交通事故中，轿车追尾碰撞货车的后果往往极其严重。
分析人士已经对此次追尾事故的深远后果进行了预测。

definition: to scrape one's car against sth/to sideswipe
small model car/mini-car/small horse-cart/barrow/wheelbarrow/type of folk dance
to crash (into another car)/(fig.) (of opinions, schedules etc) to clash/(of subject matter) to be the same
